Title: Requires social media networks to provide and maintain mechanisms for deleting individual accounts on their platform
Summary: Requires social media networks to provide and maintain mechanisms for deleting individual accounts on their platform; requires social media networks to have a clear and concise policy readily available and accessible on their website and application which includes how such social media network will delete individual user accounts and all associated personal data on their platform.
LawCode: Add ยง394-cccc, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring social media networks to provide and maintain mechanisms for deleting individual accounts on their platform
